Arcane Sweeper

From League of Legends Wiki, LoL Wiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the removed item, see: Arcane Sweeper (Item)

This article or section may contain obsolete information, but exists here for historical purposes.

  • This item was removed on patch V25.10.
Arcane Sweeper
Edit
Stats
Active
Summons a mist over the target location for 5 seconds, granting sight of the area in a 375 radius and revealing enemy traps within for 3 seconds (30 second cooldown; 800 range).
Limitations
Cannot be activated during the first 120 seconds of the game.
Recipe
Cost
0
Sell
0
ID
3348
Availability
Arena

Arcane Sweeper was a trinket item in League of Legends. It was exclusive to Arena.

Other media[edit source]

Patch History

V25.10 - Removed
  • Removed from the game on May 14th, 2025 since Arena is no longer available.
V25.05 - Re-added
  • Available on Arena.
V14.19 - Removed
  • Removed from the game on September 24th, 2024 since Arena is no longer available.
V14.9 - Re-added
  • Available on Arena on May 1st, 2024.
V14.1 - Removed
  • Removed from the game on January 8th, 2024 since Arena is no longer available.
V13.24 - Re-added
  • Available on Arena on December 7th, 2023.
V13.16 - Removed
  • Removed from the game on August 28th, 2023 (11:59 PM PST) since Arena is no longer available.
V13.14 - Re-added
  • Available on Arena on July 20th, 2023 (1 PM PST).
  • Cooldown reduced to 30 seconds from 90.
V9.23 - Removed
  • Removed from the game on November 19th, 2019 since Twisted Treeline was removed from the game.
V6.9
  • Renamed to Arcane Sweeper from Hextech Sweeper.
V5.11 - Added
  • Hextech Sweeper
    • Automatically bought trinket in Twisted Treeline.
    • Active: Covers an area with stealth-detecting mist for 5 seconds, granting vision of units which pass through it for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown) (800 range, 375 AoE Radius).
    • Limitations: Limited to 1 Trinket. Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.
